item.title: Fujifilm has launched the X100T premium compact camera in the Middle East
item.description: Fujifilm has introduced the X100T, a high-end compact camera succeeding the successful X100S, to the Middle East market. Source: Fujifilm. The X100T is available in black and silver. “The X100, launched in March 2011, established a new market for premium compact cameras. A year later, the second-generation X100S was released, featuring an updated sensor, processor, and an advanced Hybrid Viewfinder,” stated Yuta Kawamura, Marketing Manager for the electronic imaging division at Fujifilm Middle East & Africa.
